name: Nordern simulator
description:
Welcome to the bald youtube cuntent creator life.

You have 1 week left to earn enough money to pay last mortgage payment.
Only problem - you dont have the money.
But not to worry too much - you're popular streamer and youtuber!
So get on your battlestation, stream games, edit video, and get ownership of the house in no time, becoming successful in life adult so you can brag about it on the internets!

Make your mom proud!



Controls :
WASD to move,
Shift to "sprint"
Q\E\ mouse buttons to interact
TAB to open journal
ESC \ P to pause

Its a game about my friend Nordern, who is a youtuber. All jokes were discussed and approved.  Do not take this game seriously. It was made in a month or so.

I am streaming gamedevelopment as a fulltime streamer and rely upon your support, guys! So, consider heading to my Patreon page and helping a little, as i got fired from my irl job. Supporting me on Patreon will give you ability to influence games im developing, adding or removing things, too!

This is my third game i made all by myself, while learning Unreal Engine. I was streaming whole process on my Twitch, come to see how games being made, leave a follow, have nice chat and listen to some synthwave, i stream 3-5 days per week!

Project became reality with strong support from my patreons and friends, and you can support my future projects, too! This will also give you early access to test builds of games and more :3
If you interested in getting source code(full project file) for you to use however you want, you can check my Patreon page, for more info.
I have discord server where i post gamedev updates and images, if you have any questions, you can join and chat.

P.S.
Every joke and reference ingame were made with permission from the mentioned people. Stuff was discussed beforehand.
